ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...
ygData.msgSnippet: If you go to Allakazahm s EQ web site, you can register and create characters including a list of their base stats and current equipment. (Base stats are
ygData.messageBody:
If you go to Allakazahm's EQ web site, you can "register" and create
"characters" including a list of their base stats and current equipment.
(Base stats are actually optional.) Once you have your gear listed, you can
ask it to search the equipment db for upgrades based on what stats you want
to improve, ie: ac and mr or cha and in, etc. It can also filter the search
and such. Anyhow, it's helped me see all kinds of stuff that could help my
various chars.


http://everquest.allakhazam.com/


http://eqdb.allakhazam.com/player.html


Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Troubador, somewhere on Innoruuk...




-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 3:26 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...


Let me know which items you all think I can improve on .. especially
weaponwise...if you want send me a private email so Im not spamming everyone
- this is already long!

Thanks, smooches, love you all :)

Halana, 58th Shammykins
Tani, 41st Bardette
Solusek Ro
